summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.4°C) and outside temperature (up 1.8°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 6807 lux) and cloud levels (up 292 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1873 m), light levels (up 12305 lux), outside temperature (up 1.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 292.5m lower than yesterday, 787.5m lower than the past week, 1873.0m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 774.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1562.0m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and near calm conditions. Periods of rain anticipated, occasional overcast conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. Changeable conditions.
